title: Mods, i know you want to throw me out.
body:
But can you not make it so obvious? If you want to remove my comments for breaking the rule included in this:

> **Facilitate Civil Discussion**- When you choose to participate in a discussion with the rest of the playerbase, always try to be respectful and receptive to another player's point of view. Also, be mindful of how you present your point of view. If a player feels strongly on a subject, don't get caught up trying to have the last word. Just state your side and exit the conversation gracefully rather than give them the opportunity to pick a fight.

then sure, whatever. Remove them if you think i broke the rules. What i said was mean, yes, i'm not denying that. I shouldn't have said that, at least on the Player Behavior board:

>     ...please learn basics of montage making.
  And nobody is targeting you, you messed up, you couldn't keep your feelings in check and you got punished for it.
  By the way, you are just making a low effort shit post, right? Because i'm unwilling to believe someone could be so deluded outside of Twitch.


But can you keep it consistent? For example, taking a jab at someone's post sure might be a subject for removal, but calling me an idiot repeatably in THE SAME THREAD is not? 

I'm aware that many of you hate my views, but i'm not leaving, even if you would want me to.

replies.body:
There are some things to keep in mind here:

* You were reported by other people. We didn't go looking for your content.
* **You didn't even receive a warning**. We just removed your content with a reminder to be more respectful.
* What other people say doesn't make your posts okay. If you have a problem with someone's post, the correct response is to report it,

> [{quoted}](name=Ulanopo,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=xnb3ryt9,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-06-21T10:40:47.188+0000)
>
> There are some things to keep in mind here:
> 
> * You were reported by other people. We didn't go looking for your content.

I know, that was a joke in regards to how much hate i get in here

> * **You didn't even receive a warning**. We just removed your content with a reminder to be more respectful.

And i have no problem with that? Like i said, if i broke the rules of course you are going to remove my comments. I'm not disputing that.

> * What other people say doesn't make your posts okay. If you have a problem with someone's post, the correct response is to report it,

And i did just that, when i saw what the other person said. As the time of writing, his/hers comments are still up.

You have not addressed the reason for which i wrote that post. I get that if my comments were breaking the rules, they would be removed, and i have no problem with that.

Here's the thing though. If the person i responded to, has a much more vile approach towards me and many other commenters, then it can be safe to assume a fair approach, right? 

That was my only point. If my content gets removed for breaking the rules, someone who also broke them, should face a simillar fate.
I suppose mods take your posting history into account. The occasional shitposter will less likely get a comment removed than aconsistent shitposter. Probably.
